name: Project Phantom
description:
This is my first indie game. So there are a lot bugs and there are a lot of features that I didn't add. So if you face any problems do let me know. But it has the basic features/mechanics that a multiplayer first person shooter(FPS) game needs.

You can create or join rooms with your friends. Play for 360 seconds (6 minutes) with your friends and show them who is better.

For now there is only one map called Ancient Orb. But in the future there will be more. Keep an eye out for that.

 Sorry for the poor game quality:|
